languages.text: "В-ваша Светлость, это А-а-анверы... банда... они самые худшие, правда! Никого не боятся, даже Наместника, господина Владайма..." {n}Парень боязливо озирается, будто ждет, что бандиты появятся снова.{/n}

"Y-Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, those guys were A-A-Anvers... they're a gang... they're the worst, I'm telling you! They're scared of no one, not even Liege Tocara..." {n}He glances around like he's expecting more bandits to appear.{/n}
languages.original_text: "В-ваша Светлость, это А-а-анверы... банда... они самые худшие, правда! Никого не боятся, даже Наместника, господина Владайма..." {n}Парень боязливо озирается, будто ждет, что бандиты появятся снова.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Y-your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, those were A-A-Anvers... they're a gang... they're the worst, I'm telling you! They're scared of no one, not even Sir Liege Vladaym..." {n}He glances around like he's expecting more bandits to appear.{/n}

"Y-your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, those were A-A-Anvers... they're a gang... they're the worst, I'm telling you! They're scared of no one, not even Sir Liege Vladaym..." {n}He glances around like he's expecting more bandits to appear.{/n}

"Y-your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, those guys were A-A-Anvers... they're a gang... they're the worst, I'm telling you! They're scared of no one, not even Lord Vladaym..." {n}He glances around like he's expecting more bandits to appear.{/n}

"Y-your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, those guys were A-A-Anvers... they're a gang... they're the worst, I'm telling you! They're scared of no one, not even Lord Vladaym..." {n}He glances around like he's expecting more bandits to appear.{/n}

"Y-Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, those guys were A-A-Anvers... they're a gang... they're the worst, I'm telling you! They're scared of no one, not even Liege Tocara..." {n}He glances around like he's expecting more bandits to appear.{/n}

languages.text: 「へ、陛下、や…奴らはアンヴァースです…ごろつきの集まりで…最悪な奴らなんです！トカラ領主でさえ恐れない不届き者で…」{n}さらに盗賊が現れるのを待ち受けているかのように、彼は周囲を見回した。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Y-Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, those guys were A-A-Anvers... they're a gang... they're the worst, I'm telling you! They're scared of no one, not even Liege Tocara..." {n}He glances around like he's expecting more bandits to appear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「へ、陛下、や…奴らはアンヴァースです…ごろつきの集まりで…最悪な奴らなんです！トカラ領主でさえ恐れない不届き者で…」{n}さらに盗賊が現れるのを待ち受けているかのように、彼は周囲を見回した。{/n}

languages.text: “大……大人，这些家伙都是安……安维尔帮的人……他们是个帮派……我可以告诉你，他们是世上最邪恶的家伙！他们什么都不怕，就连托卡拉总督也吓不住他们……”{n}他环顾四周，似乎认为会出现更多暴徒。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Y-Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, those guys were A-A-Anvers... they're a gang... they're the worst, I'm telling you! They're scared of no one, not even Liege Tocara..." {n}He glances around like he's expecting more bandits to appear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “大……大人，这些家伙都是安……安维尔帮的人……他们是个帮派……我可以告诉你，他们是世上最邪恶的家伙！他们什么都不怕，就连弗拉迪姆总督也吓不住他们……”{n}他环顾四周，似乎认为会出现更多暴徒。{/n}

languages.text: «{mf|M-milord|M-milady}, eran A-A-Anvers... una banda... ¡Le advierto de que son de lo peor! No le temen a nada, ni siquiera al Señor Tocara...». {n}Mira a su alrededor como si esperara que aparecieran más bandidos.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Y-Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, those guys were A-A-Anvers... they're a gang... they're the worst, I'm telling you! They're scared of no one, not even Liege Tocara..." {n}He glances around like he's expecting more bandits to appear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «{mf|M-milord|M-milady}, eran A-A-Anvers... una banda... ¡Le advierto de que son de lo peor! No le temen a nada, ni siquiera al Señor Vladaym...». {n}Mira a su alrededor como si esperara que aparecieran más bandidos.{/n}

languages.text: « V-Votre Seigneurie, ces hommes faisaient partie des... des Anver... C'est un gang... Le pire de tous ! Ils n'ont peur de personne, pas même du suzerain Tocara... » {n}Il regarde tout autour de lui, comme s'il s'attendait à voir apparaître d'autres bandits.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Y-Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, those guys were A-A-Anvers... they're a gang... they're the worst, I'm telling you! They're scared of no one, not even Liege Tocara..." {n}He glances around like he's expecting more bandits to appear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « V-Votre Seigneurie, ces hommes faisaient partie des... des Anver... C'est un gang... Le pire de tous ! Ils n'ont peur de personne, pas même du suzerain Vladaym... » {n}Il regarde tout autour de lui, comme s'il s'attendait à voir apparaître d'autres bandits.{/n}

languages.text: "Eu-Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, das waren A-A-Anvers ... das ist eine Bande ... die allerschlimmste, das sage ich Euch! Sie fürchten niemanden, nicht einmal Lehnsherr Tocara ..." {n}Er sieht sich um, als würde er erwarten, dass noch mehr Banditen auftauchen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Y-Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, those guys were A-A-Anvers... they're a gang... they're the worst, I'm telling you! They're scared of no one, not even Liege Tocara..." {n}He glances around like he's expecting more bandits to appear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Eu-Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, das waren A-A-Anvers ... das ist eine Bande ... die allerschlimmste, das sage ich Euch! Sie fürchten niemanden, nicht einmal Lehnsherr Vladaym ..." {n}Er sieht sich um, als würde er erwarten, dass noch mehr Banditen auftauchen.{/n}

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, bu adamlar An... Anverlardı. Çeteler. Çok beterdirler, hem de çok! Kimseden korkuları yoktur. Emîr Tocara'dan bile." {n}Başka haydutların da ortaya çıkmasını bekler gibi çevresini kolaçan ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Y-Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, those guys were A-A-Anvers... they're a gang... they're the worst, I'm telling you! They're scared of no one, not even Liege Tocara..." {n}He glances around like he's expecting more bandits to appear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, bu adamlar An... Anverlardı. Bir çetedirler. Çok beterdirler, söylemiş olayım! Kimseden korkmazlar. Emîr Tocara'dan bile." {n}Daha çok haydudun gelmesini bekliyor gibi çevresini kolaçan ediyor.{/n}
